groovyx.gaelyk.routes
[Groovy] Class RoutesFilter

java.lang.Object
  groovyx.gaelyk.routes.RoutesFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
class RoutesFilter

RoutesFilter is a Servlet Filter whose responsability is to define URL mappings for your Gaelyk application. When the servlet filter is configured, a file named routes.groovy will be loaded by the filter, defining the various routes a web request may follow.

It is possible to customize the location of the routes definition file by using the routes.location init parameter in the declaration of the filter in web.xml.

In development mode, routes will be reloaded automatically on each request, but when the application is deployed on the Google cloud, all the routes will be set in stone.

Authors:
Guillaume Laforge
